p: In this study, we observed that the presence of vascular congestion around and within the glomerulus in the cortical and medullary region, arteriolar hyalinosis, damaged mesangial cells, lymphocytic infiltrate in the cortical and medullary region, fibrous increase in the Bowmanâ€™s capsule, and thickened basement membrane in the cortical region are all associated with DENV-4 infection and replication, demonstrated by the presence of the DENV NS3 protein [ 20, 42].
